result.execSummary:
The defendant Demetrius A Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Robbery with Threat of Force [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $4,535.00 to Roxanne H. Joint and several with Brandi Olins 14CF258 and Davon Thompson 14CF260.

Provide DNA sample, pay surcharge.  Pay all applicable costs, fees and surcharges.
AS TO RESTITUTION/ALL FINANCIAL OBLIGATIONS:  DOC to collect from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of Extended supervison. Any balance remaining unpaid at that time is to be converted to a cvil judgment against the defendant.

superMiscConds.notes: Seek and maintain full time employment.  Obtain HSED or GED.

No new law violations rising to the level of probable cause.
Not to possess weapons.
No contact with Roxanne H., Katrina K, minors SW and JW.

Cooperate with the department.
Complete cognitive intervention program. and with any other trteatment deemed necessary.
AODA assessment. Cooperate with any treatment. Maintain absolute sobriety. Random urine screens.

supervisions.notes: Pursuant to Wisconsin Statutes section 973.176, the Court advised the defendant of the following restrictions:  firearm possession; voting.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Demetrius A Robinson

records.addlTxt:
HEARD IN BR 34 FOR BR 10
Defendant Demetrius A Robinson in court with attorney Crystal L Saltzwadel.  Defendant Demetrius A Robinson in custody.  Grant Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Presentence report reviewed.  Statements made as to sentencing.
The Court sentenced the defendant to a MAXIMUM TERM OF IMPRISONMENT of 11 YEARS, with credit for 161 days time served; the INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prison System is 6 years; the MAXIMUM TERM OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION is 5 years.  The defendant is not eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program or the Wisconsin Substance Abuse Program.  
Terms of extended supervision:
-No new law violations rising to the level of probable cause
-Cooperate with the Department
-Possess no weapons
-AODA assessment and cooperate with any treatment
-Maintain absolute sobriety with random urine screens
-Complete Cognitive intervention program
-Cooperate with any other treatment deemed necessary
-No contact with Roxanne H, Katrina K, minors SW and JW
-Seek and maintain full time employment
-Obtain HSED or GED
Defendant to pay restitution $4535.00 to Roxanne H joint and several with Brandi Ollins 14CF258 and Davon Thompson 14CF260
The court ordered defendant provide DNA sample--pay surcharge through collection by the Department of Corrections from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of extended supervision; any balance remaining unpaid at that time is to be converted to a civil judgment against the defendant 
The Court ordered all applicable costs, fees and surcharges to be paid through collection by the Department of Corrections from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of extended supervision; any balance remaining unpaid at that time is to be converted to a civil judgment against the defendant    

Pursuant to Wisconsin Statutes section 973.176, the Court advised the defendant of the following restrictions:  Firearm possession; Voting 

Filed:
Pretrial Incarceration Credit;
Ineligible Voting Notice & Acknowledgement;
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  kmw

Certification of transcript of proceedings of PLEA HEARING  commencing MAY 20, 2014 received and filed. (13 Pages.)
Copy of transcript forwarded to  Calvin Malone - SPD.

Defendant Demetrius A Robinson in court with attorney Crystal L Saltzwadel.  Defendant Demetrius A Robinson in custody.  Antoni J Apollo appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Grant Huebner.  
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found defendant guilty as charged in the Information and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.  
Case adjourned for sentencing hearing in Branch 10.
Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may not possess firearms.
Court advised defendant that he may not vote until civil rights are restored.  
Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 26, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Crystal L Saltzwadel in court, defendant Demetrius A Robinson not in court, in custody.  Grant Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 10.  Plea hearing scheduled for May 20, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.

Attorney Crystal L. Saltzwadel in court, defendant Demetrius A Robinson not in court, in custody.  Grant Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case is adjourned for final pretrial conference and for jury trial in Branch 10.
Filed, signed Felony Pretrial Scheduling Order.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 12, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for May 27, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Crystal Saltzwadel in court, defendant Demetrius A Robinson not in court, in custody.  Kevin Shomin appeared for the State of Wisconsin for Grant Huebner.
Case adjourned for scheduling conference in Branch 10.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 5, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Transcript PRELIMINARY HEARING commencing 01/30/2014 received and filed.  Original transcript in case file 14CF000260 (36 Pages).

Defendant Demetrius A Robinson in court with attorney Crystal Saltzwadel.  Defendant Demetrius A Robinson in custody.  Grant Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.  Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the state: City of Milwaukee Detective Shelonda Tarver.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 10.  Scheduling conference scheduled for February 13, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION with drug testing.     No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dugan, Branch 10.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 30, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Demetrius A Robinson in court with attorney Anne Jaspers.  Defendant Demetrius A Robinson in custody.  Carole R Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  vk  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Defense motion to dismiss the complaint on lack of probable cause heard and denied by the court.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
